data.title: Region 4 - Prince George's County
data.text:
Contact Information:

Office of Child Care Region 4 (Prince George's County)

Maryland State Department of Education

807 Brightseat Road

Landover, MD 20785

Map This Location

Hours of Operation: Monday through Friday * 8:30 am - 5:00 pm -- Please call the "Main Office" if you have any questions and/or concerns.

Main Office Phone

301-333-6940

Office e-mail occ4pg.msde@maryland.gov Office fax 301-499-6999

Anyone who is interested in starting a child care business in a home or center is required to take the face-to-face orientation training. Please contact the Office of Child Care Regional Licensing Office to schedule the Orientation Training.

To prepare for your orientation session, you may wish to view the on-line orientation preview. This does not replace the face-to-face orientation session you are required to attend at your regional Office of Child Care. ​ (Click here to go to the Orientation page)"

To obtain required "local permits" for a child care center license or family child care registration - Click Here

For Provider Training (Pre-Service and Continuing) - please click here to find MSDE-approved training coursed, trainers and training organizations.

Region 4 - Upcoming Events and Other Information:

Licensing Orientations

As a new applicant, you are required to attend an orientation session offered by the Office of Child Care (OCC) before the OCC can conduct an initial inspection.

To become a child care provider you first need to decide if you want to open a business in your home or if you want to create a center-based business. Below is a definition of each type of business:

Family Child Care – You may provide care for up to 8 children in your home

Large Family Child Care – You may care for up to 12 children in your home

Child Care Center – You may provide care in a facility outside of your home that is zoned to be used as a child care center. The number of children you serve is dependent upon the square footage of the building.

You may take the appropriate virtual online orientation at:

Large Family Child Care https://earlychildhood.marylandpublicschools.org/child-care-providers/li...

Family Child Care https://earlychildhood.marylandpublicschools.org/child-care-providers/li...

Child Care Center https://earlychildhood.marylandpublicschools.org/child-care-providers/li...

After taking the appropriate online orientation, you will be scheduled for one of the following Virtual Google Meet Orientations. Your online orientation does not replace the requirement for virtual face-to-face

orientation.

Office of Child Care Prince George's Co. Orientations

While we are teleworking all meetings, orientations, and trainings will be done virtually through Google Meet.

Family Child Care Virtual Face to Face Orientation

August 10, 2023 – 1:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m.

September 14, 2023 – 1:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m.

October 12, 2023 – 1:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m.

November 9, 2023 – 1:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m.

Child Care Center/ Large Family Child Care Home/ Letter of Compliance Virtual Face to Face Orientation

August 17, 2023 – 1:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m.

September 21, 2023 – 1:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m.

October 19, 2023 – 1:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m.

November 16, 2023 – 1:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m.

REGULATION REVIEW TRAINING FOR NEW CENTER DIRECTORS (Directors Administration Training)

Center Director Regulation Review Virtual Face to Face Training

May, 2023 – 1:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m. Date TBA

July, 2023 – 1:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m. Date TBA

October, 2023 – 1:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m. Date TBA

This training is offered by the office for new center directors. It is required by regulation COMAR 13A.16.06.05B(5) which states, “Within 6 months after date of hire, complete a regulation training to the requirements of this subtitle that is conducted by the office, if hired on or after January 2009.”

All directors are welcome to attend. To register, contact your assigned Licensing Specialist. All DAT trainings will be held Virtual Google Meet, from 1:00 p.m. to 4:00 p.m.

This is a forum that child care providers attend to receive updates, regulation reviews, and other pertinent information.

This is a forum that child care providers attend to receive updates, regulation reviews, and other pertinent information.

Center/LOC/Large Family Virtual Face to Face

May 10, 2023 - 10:30 a.m. - 12:30pm

October 25, 2023, - 10:30 a.m. - 12:30pm

There will be announcements sent by email on how to register for these events

Family Virtual Face to Face

May 17, 2023 - 12:30 p.m. – 3:00 p.m.

October 26, 2023 - 12:30 p.m. – 3:00 p.m.

There will be announcements sent by email to all license/registered providers on how to register for these events.
